oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Clayton McMichen radio program (WAVE)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Clayton McMichen radio show for WAVE, Louisville, KY. Featuring performances by Clayton McMichen, the Georgia Wildcats, Cliff Gross and his Texas Cowboys (introduced as the Gross Trio), Lindy Lou, Corncob & Shuck, Dixie Lee, and Betty Lane.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Clayton McMichen; Georgia Wildcats; Cliff Gross Trio
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme (My Old Kentucky Home) -- Opening statement (Clayton McMichen) -- Boil Them Cabbage Down (Clayton McMichen calls) -- Clayton McMichen introduces the Gross Trio -- Roll Along Jordan (Cliff Gross Trio) -- Clayton McMichen introduces Lindy Lou -- I'll Go Riding Down That Old Texas Trail (Lindy Lou) -- Clayton McMichen introduces Corncob & Shuck -- Old Grey Bonnet (Corncob & Shuck) -- Clayton McMichen introduces Dixie Lee, Betty Lane, and Lindy Lou -- You Are My Sunshine (Dixie Lee, Betty Lane, Lindy Lou) -- Clayton McMichen introduces Corncob & Shuck -- Listen To The Mockingbird (Corncob & Shuck) -- Clayton McMichen introduces Betty Lane -- Beautiful Dreamer (Betty Lane) -- Clayton McMichen talks -- She'll Be Coming 'Round The Mountain [incomplete, end missing]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WAVE (Radio station : Louisville, Ky.); McMichen, Clayton, 1900-1970; Georgia Wildcats (Musical group); Gross, Clifford; Texas Cowboys (Musical group)
